                <td width="5"><img src="http://www.nimli.com/images/spacer.gif"></td> 
                
 
 
 
	<script type="text/javascript"> 
 
	divHere=false;
 
	 function toggleDiv(comegoDiv){

		var divObject = document.getElementById(comegoDiv);

		if (divHere == false) {
			divObject.style.display = 'block';
			divHere=true;
		}
		else {
			divObject.style.display = 'none';
			divHere=false;
		}
	 }

	 </script> 

	  <td valign="top" align="left"> 

	   <a href="javascript:toggleDiv('googleTranslate');" class="bottomNavigationHighLightText">English</a>  

	  </td> 
              </tr>
